articles.author: Bethan Edwards
articles.title: Netflix leave viewers 'utterly devastated' as the streaming service cancels supernatural series - Daily Mail
articles.description: Netflix's fans have been left fuming after the streaming service cancelled the supernatural series Lockwood & Co. after just one season.
articles.content:
Netflix's fans have been left fuming after the streaming service cancelled the supernatural series Lockwood & Co. after just one season. 
The production company announced in a statement that the… [+2957 chars]
